content.body: Hall of Web IDL shame (includes Web IDL due to a fault in Cookie Store): https://github.com/w3c/webref/tree/main/ed/idlpatches
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Hall of Web IDL shame (includes Web IDL due to a fault in Cookie Store): https://github.com/w3c/webref/tree/main/ed/idlpatches

content.body:
Hello annevk I've been working on Deno MIME sniffing tests, but noticed that if we pass all mimesniff tests, FileAPI tests begin to fail. Could you take a look at: https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/issues/36377

It seems Blob (FileAPI) and mimesniff spec/tests conflict with each other.
